lyrics:
4 contributorscrush lyricsverse 1
when my pass came in you dropped the ball
it didnt change the way i feel
and i was wishing id break down your walls
the kiss will know if lips stay still

prechorus 1
there is a line i crossed
and when you missed i lost
im not a loser
girl you know that ill be back again

chorus
my dear i went for the steal
maybe it was rushed
oh my crush ive got a crush

verse 2
i suppose that i could hold it in ooh
but you excite my every cell
sources say that senses are your friends
my senses say that i should tell

prechorus 2
you that im not ashamed
you might just feel the same
but you have to try it
if youre ever really gonna know
see gavin degraw liveget tickets as low as 53you might also likechorus
my dear i went for the steal
maybe it was rushed
oh my crush ive got a crush

bridge
i want to i need to
i have to have you
youre so much to touch
girl youre too much and i cant control it
youve got me all over the road

chorus
my dear i went for the steal
maybe it was rushed
oh my crush damaging my soul

outro
you blew me off but i dont mind
i just get better with time
and so do you so do you so do you
oh oh oh my crushembed
